name: Basic Yummy Stuffing
author: LISA BALLS
summary: This basic Thanksgiving stuffing is flavored with oysters (adjust the amount to taste) and prepared in a baking dish.
ingredients: 1 (1 pound) loaf day-old bread, torn into small pieces
directions: Preheat oven to 375  degrees F (190 degrees C)
Melt butter in a large saucepan over medium heat
Slowly cook and stir celery and onions until onions are translucent, about 10 minutes
Stir in oysters, poultry seasoning, bread and enough turkey drippings to keep the mixture moist but not soggy
When bread pieces are thoroughly coated, transfer the mixture to a 9x13 inch baking dish
Cover and bake in the preheated oven 30 to 45 minutes, until lightly browned
